casebody.data:
Ahmed Salem Bin Ali JABER, Personal Representative of the Estate of Salem Bin Ali Jaber, By His Next Friend Faisal Bin Ali Jaber, et al., petitioners,
v.
UNITED STATES, et al. No. 17-472. Supreme Court of the United States Nov. 27, 2017.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the District of Columbia Circuit denied.
